name: Starecase Ripers
description:
Deaths behind you 'run'!

There are opportunities to live but it comes with a price. 

You need to push forward in life without wasting anytime.

Be ready for anything.

Press the download button 

extract the rar file 

and ur set to go

Then you need to click on .exe

Use W A S D and Space Bar Press Escape to go back to the menu.
